trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica un dispositivo de control que envía información a una impresora.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> utiliza esta clase.

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de la impresión, consulte la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> información general del espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos referentes a cómo se imprimirá una página en el documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir una página en un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Si se produce una excepción dentro de un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> , no se llama.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> is required.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> se llama desde un contexto de impresión de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> es necesario.

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.
trans-unit.target: Impresión a la impresora predeterminada, es necesario un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>
trans-unit.target: Todas las otras llamadas a este método requiere un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: La interfaz de programación de aplicaciones (API) Win32 nativa no ha podido terminar de escribir en una página.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar el acceso a las impresoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración relacionada: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos referentes a cómo imprimir el documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Incluso si se ha producido una excepción no detectada durante el proceso de impresión, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> se llama.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: La interfaz de programación de aplicaciones (API) Win32 nativa no ha podido completar la tarea de impresión.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: La API Win32 nativa no ha podido eliminar el contexto de dispositivo (DC) especificado.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar el acceso a las impresoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración relacionada: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos referentes a cómo se imprimirá una página en el documento.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> property of this parameter will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Al principio, la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> de este parámetro será <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto desde el método <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> se utilizará para establecer esta propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Comienza la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir una página en un documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa una página de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> se llama inmediatamente antes de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que se usa en la impresión.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: La interfaz de programación de aplicaciones (API) Win32 nativa no ha podido preparar el controlador de la impresora para aceptar datos.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: La API Win32 nativa no ha podido actualizar el contexto de dispositivo (DC) de impresora o plotter utilizando la información especificada.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar el acceso a las impresoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración relacionada: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos referentes a cómo imprimir el documento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Comienza la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que se usa en la impresión.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> comprueba que la configuración de impresora es válida.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: La configuración de la impresora no es válida.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: La interfaz de programación de aplicaciones (API) Win32 nativa no ha podido producir una tarea de impresión.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar el acceso a las impresoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeración relacionada: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
